attributes.action: TELL US WHY you simply cannot hoist in that your lie over an EU referendum means that, at whatever cost, we prefer to have Ed as PM.
attributes.additional_details:
What we want you to do for us is in upper case lettering.  You seem, so often, to be unable to identify what we want you to do.  We hope this is helpful.


Which part of 'WE WILL NOT HAVE A LIAR AS PM' is it that you simply cannot understand? You are simply NOT AN OPTION.
